医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
低热量饮食是治疗多囊卵巢综合症 (PCOS) 的方法吗？极低热量饮食对患有多囊卵巢综合症的肥胖女性的中度能量不足饮食的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/How-does-a-very-low-or-moderate-calorie-diet-affect-obese-women-with-Polycystic-Ovary-Syndrome-（PCOS ).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/How-does-a-very-low-or-moderate-calorie-diet-affect-obese-women-with-Polycystic-Ovary-Syndrome-（PCOS ).aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1943731c-9922-4eb5-97d7-c83147200a0b Fri, 08 Sep 2023 03:43:00 -0400 Is a very low-calorie diet the answer to Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)?
自我辅助 RNA 疫苗增强免疫反应的能力是现有疫苗的 10 倍事实证明，针对 Covid-19 的 RNA 疫苗可以有效减轻疾病的严重程度。然而，麻省理工学院的一组研究人员正在努力让它们变得更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Self-adjuvanting-RNA-vaccines-boost-immune-response-10x-more-than-existing-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Self-adjuvanting-RNA-vaccines-boost-immune-response-10x-more-than-existing-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcfce1a2-cf80-49e0-a897-05d8eb0bdba1 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 03:05:31 -0400 Self-adjuvanting RNA vaccines boost immune response 10x more than existing vaccines
senolytic 疗法的 I 期试验显示出治疗阿尔茨海默病的希望据阿尔茨海默病协会称，阿尔茨海默病是导致痴呆症的最常见原因，影响着超过 650 万美国人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/第一阶段试验-of-senolytic-therapy-shows-promise-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/第一阶段试验-of-senolytic-therapy-shows-promise-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd95fa32-ee3e-467f-8464-e7303ea0003d Fri, 08 Sep 2023 02:54:24 -0400 Phase I trial of senolytic therapy shows promise in Alzheimer's disease
西奈山和 BCRI 合作改善拉丁美洲的心血管健康和教育西奈山伊坎医学院今天宣布，它已与巴西临床研究所 (BCRI) 签署了一份谅解备忘录，重点推进心血管疾病研究、创新和医学教育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Mount-Sinai-and-BCRI-partner-to-improve-cardioangio-health-and-education-in-Latin-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Mount-Sinai-and-BCRI-partner-to-improve-cardioangio-health-and-education-in-Latin-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77d97c99-4c37-432a-bd29-4e4ecc265682 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 02:04:22 -0400 Mount Sinai and BCRI partner to improve cardiovascular health and education in Latin America
可穿戴技术成为运动员早期检测 COVID-19 的潜在游戏规则改变者在佛罗里达州立大学进行的一项开创性研究中，可穿戴技术已成为 NCAA I 级女学生运动员早期检测 COVID-19 的潜在改变者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Wearable-technology-emerges-as-a-潜在-game-changer-in-early-detection-of-COVID-19-among-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Wearable-technology-emerges-as-a-潜在-game-changer-in-early-detection-of-COVID-19-among-athletes.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6af226e7-8401-4830-9b15-4add30c67353 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 01:55:57 -0400 Wearable technology emerges as a potential game-changer in early detection of COVID-19 among athletes
美国新数据显示，纽约大学朗格尼分校提供全国最高质量的肾脏和肺移植项目根据新的联邦质量数据，纽约大学朗格移植研究所提供全美最高质量的肾脏和肺移植项目，而其心脏和肝脏移植项目则拥有纽约最高的器官存活率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/NYU-Langone-offers-the-highest-quality-kidney-and-lung-transplant-programs-in-the-nation-new-US-data-揭示.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/NYU-Langone-offers-the-highest-quality-kidney-and-lung-transplant-programs-in-the-nation-new-US-data-揭示.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e85bce0a-3e0d-40c7-b0bf-e622cf8f4b10 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 01:50:26 -0400 NYU Langone offers the highest-quality kidney and lung transplant programs in the nation, new U.S. data reveals
揭示肥胖相关代谢功能障碍与内养蛋白之间的关系随着全球肥胖率预计将继续上升，迫切需要了解导致糖尿病等代谢疾病的复杂机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Unraveling-the-relationship- Between-obesity-lated-metabolic-dysfunction-and-endotropin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Unraveling-the-relationship- Between-obesity-lated-metabolic-dysfunction-and-endotropin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fadcafde-98b3-4f9d-b590-a52c21beb26b Fri, 08 Sep 2023 01:44:28 -0400 Unraveling the relationship between obesity-related metabolic dysfunction and endotrophin
酮饮食可能会降低多囊卵巢综合症女性的睾酮水平根据《内分泌学会杂志》发表的一篇新论文，生酮饮食可能会降低多囊卵巢综合征 (PCOS) 女性的睾酮水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Keto-diet-may-lower-testosterone-levels-in-women-with-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Keto-diet-may-lower-testosterone-levels-in-women-with-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95405e40-507c-4456-b1cb-92cb42e6f187 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 01:38:40 -0400 Keto diet may lower testosterone levels in women with PCOS
丙型肝炎患者治疗后重新接种乙型肝炎疫苗可能会受益明尼苏达大学医学院最近发表的研究表明，丙型肝炎患者应考虑重新接种乙型肝炎疫苗。该研究发表在《传染病杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Hepatitis-C-患者-may-benefit-from-revaccination-against-hepatitis-B-after-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Hepatitis-C-患者-may-benefit-from-revaccination-against-hepatitis-B-after-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=847aabab-9ee7-4fb8-a254-4099c41af001 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 01:08:17 -0400 Hepatitis C patients may benefit from revaccination against hepatitis B after treatment
研究人员开发出第一个连续监测移植器官健康状况的电子设备西北大学的研究人员开发出了第一台用于实时连续监测移植器官健康状况的电子设备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Researchers-develop-first-electronic-device-for-continuously-monitoring-health-of-transplanted-organs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Researchers-develop-first-electronic-device-for-continuously-monitoring-health-of-transplanted-organs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51d20b83-2720-4e8b-896d-ba717f1e246e Fri, 08 Sep 2023 01:03:21 -0400 Researchers develop first electronic device for continuously monitoring health of transplanted organs
